extracted_playbook.title: Review Ivanti's Security Advisory
extracted_playbook.description: Review Ivanti's security advisory to understand the details of the vulnerability and recommended actions.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade all affected versions of Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) Version 11.4 releases 11.10, 11.9, 11.8
Older versions/releases of Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile
